text.__SUMMARY__: Inga unica is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae. It is found only in Brazil.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Inga unica". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38245A10107656. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38245A10107656.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
